title: The Writers Almanac - Tuesday, November 5, 2019
description: Playwright Sam Shepard was born on this day in 1943. He said of creativity, “When you hit a wall, just kick it in.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Playwright Sam Shepard was born on this day in 1943. He said of creativity, “When you hit a wall, just kick it in.”
